    • sceneSetup

      public void sceneSetup(InGameController primaryController, Map<String,String> playersAndTokens, String firstPlayer)
      This method sets up the scene
      Parameters:
      primaryController - is the reference to the controller of the main Scene of the Game
      playersAndTokens - is the reference to a Map that keeps saved as key the name of a player and as value the respective token chosen
      firstPlayer - is the name of the firstPlayer, in order to assign correctly the black token

    • back

      public void back(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This method is called when the Client clicks on the backButton and brings the player back to the main scene
      Parameters:
      e - is the mouseclick on the backButton

    • showPersonalBoardOnClick

      public void showPersonalBoardOnClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      In case a Client decides to see his personal cardGrid by clicking his name he will be brought back to the main scene
      Parameters:
      e - is the mouseclick on the Label containing the name of the Client

    • showBoardOnClick

      public void showBoardOnClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      This method enables the feature of visualizing a player's cardGrid by clicking on his label in the billBoard
      Parameters:
      e -
